Author: Nunubu Nubu
Name: AI Companion
Description: A void-touched bardic companion for Dalamud. Chat window, persona.txt, routing triggers with whitelist, ChatTwo IPC/native posting, and chronicles — tuned for Dalamud 13 + .NET 9.
Punchline: Song for a soul! Any song for the price of one’s soul—bargain deal!
Changelog: v5.0.0.4 — Real backend requests, ChatTwo IPC default with switchable routing, persona editor, slash commands, listener fixes.
